summary: The diff shows partial implementation of post creation functionality. CreatePostForm was enhanced with success/error feedback and form clearing (REQ-60). HomePage was updated to include CreatePostForm for authenticated users (REQ-58). However, critical evidence for REQ-59 (section page integration verification) is missing from the diff, though frontend-file-summaries.txt mentions SectionPage includes a post creation form.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that the CreatePostForm component is properly integrated into the SectionPage component for Civil Debate, Aggressive Debate, Quotes & Poems, and Random Debates sections
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to SectionPage.tsx appear in the diff. While frontend-file-summaries.txt mentions SectionPage has 'post creation form', there's no evidence in the diff showing verification or updates to this integration for all four sections

hallucinated_features.description: HomePage CreatePostForm uses hardcoded SectionType.civilDebate instead of no section/general section
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-58 specifies posts should 'appear in the general feed without specifying a section', but the implementation passes section={SectionType.civilDebate}, which tags posts with Civil Debate section rather than keeping them general
